name: tech-hub
description: This application is a comprehensive Tech Hub Platform, integrating both client-side and server-side components into a seamless experience. Designed using the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, and Node.js), it leverages a single-root project structure for straightforward setup and execution. To ensure optimal functionality, please update the .env files as necessary. The project initiates from the root directory, simplifying the start-up process and enhancing the development workflow.

scripts.start-server-dev: cd server && npm run watch && nodemon dist/server.js
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install

author: Roshan Karunarathna
